```{r}
install.packages('tidyverse')
install.packages('sf')
install.packages('dplyr')
```
Load the library
```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(sf)
library(dplyr)
```
Load the data
```{r}
january_df <- read.csv('../data/yellow_tripdata_2019-01.csv')
map_nyc <- read_sf('../data/taxi_zones.shp')
```
Edit the january DF keeping only the column needed for the map
```{r}
janauary_df_reduce <- subset(january_df, select = c(tpep_pickup_datetime,tpep_dropoff_datetime,PULocationID,DOLocationID))
```
Plot the NYC map
```{r}
ggplot()+
  geom_sf(
    data = map_nyc
    )
```
